tag_list: user-interface, ui, usability, interaction-design, architect, software-developer, engineer
overview:
Edward Ishak, Ph.D. is a User Interface Architect in the Internet industry currently working as the lead front-end developer and interaction designer at Tracked.com, a business information site.

He previously worked as the lead front-end developer at Quigo Technologies, which was acquired by AOL in December 2007.

He received his Ph.D. in Computer Science from Columbia University working under Professor Steven Feiner in the Computer Graphics and User Interface lab. He also received his M.S. from Columbia and his B.S. from U.C. San Diego, both in Computer Science.

Edward has also worked at Microsoft, Google, PARC, and Hewlett Packard.

His interests include baseball, Coptic hymnology and iconography, and photography.
